body_html:
Does this mean GPU is used for feature extraction of audio signals or for training models.

Both! It's up to you whether a GPU is used for feature extraction -- you can control where the ops run with tf.device.
body_text:
Does this mean GPU is used for feature extraction of audio signals or for training models.

Both! It's up to you whether a GPU is used for feature extraction -- you can control where the ops run with tf.device.
body:
> Does this mean GPU is used for feature extraction of audio signals or for training models.

Both! It's up to you whether a GPU is used for feature extraction -- you can control where the ops run with `tf.device`.
